trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>

trans-unit.source: To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.
trans-unit.target: 若要允許<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件，您必須先將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To control the actions programmatically that are performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制以程式設計的方式，回傳時，會執行的動作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>是按下，提供的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property stores a string that is associated with the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object when clicked.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>屬性儲存的行為與相關聯的字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件時按下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This string is passed in the ImageMapEventArgs event data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串會傳遞 ImageMapEventArgs 事件資料時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>按下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>|The string assigned to the `value` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>|指派給字串`value`參數。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> object assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>物件指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>已按下的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.String>指派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*>屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>已按下的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Use this property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>已按下的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
